segments.text: I'm really curious . What is it like doing housework all day for a living ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a little like being a mom , only I get paid for it !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I still think that it is a bitstrange that you like to do that kind of thing . Most women would rather hire a maid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's exactly why my business is doing so well !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How Ay clients do you have already ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I've been in business for one month now and I have ten clients .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow . Too bad I don't have a clue about housework .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you ever need a job , let me know . I can always train you .
segments.speaker: S2
